Generates a non-deterministic uniformly-distributed random value. 

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A random number uniformly distributed in [{{c|min()}}, {{c|max()}}].

===Exceptions===
Throws an implementation-defined exception derived from {{lc|std::exception}} if a random number could not be generated.
